medical_history.chief_complaint: Post-prandial epigastric pain radiating to RUQ and back, associated with nausea and vomiting.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient began experiencing severe abdominal pain after having chicken parmesan for dinner, starting at 11PM. The pain increased with deep inspiration and did not improve until 5AM the following morning after receiving pain medication in the ED. Patient also reports similar abdominal pain episodes after dinner, lasting several hours before improving without any intervention.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Past medical history is not specified; previous surgical history includes appendectomy.
